Lyrics:
Vocalist: Zach Linley - Dallas, TX

V1   
The plant closed – moved to Mexico  
So much for investin' -- here at home  
Ain’t no work now in our small town  
Just take a look around – kind’a run-down  

V1a
My girl left after I lost my job  
Went back to live with her mom n’  
Really…I mean…who can blame her (Oh, man)   
Good luck’s been a stranger 

Ch   
Get up every mornin’ -- doin’ my best   
Reminding myself how I’m truly blessed  
Got my health, yeah, n’ I got my pride  
No matter what, I’m gettin’ by…  
Till I’m dyin' I’m tryin' 

V2
Could move away – leave this life I made  
But my great great grand-folks came in 1908  
Family - a few friends – that’s all I got left (except’)  
An empty house full ‘a debt n’ regret 

Ch2
Get up every mornin’ -- doin’ my best   
Reminding myself how I’m truly blessed  
Got my health, yeah, n’ I got my pride  
No matter what, I’m gettin’ by…  
Till I’m dyin’, I’m tryin’ 

Br 
I want things to change   
[Don't wanna explain] Gonna go insane 
Feel tired n’ alone   
What’s left in my soul  
Just enough to keep on a’ [tryin’]

Ch3
Get up every mornin’ -- doin’ my best   
Reminding myself how I’m truly blessed  
Got my health, yeah, n’ I got my pride  
No matter what, I’m gettin’ by…  
Till I’m dying, I’m trying  
Oh, I keep on trying
Til I’m dying, I’m trying
Oh, I keep on trying

Holding hands the other day

You stop talking

You stop talking

Title: HELLO MELLOW - INSTRO
Comment:
Thanks for listening! 

This sensational musical piece typifies amazing creativity, which is flush in his music. His creativity can't be imagined.

NEITHER CAN HIS EXTREME PAIN & LIMITED MOBILITY. Might be the kindest person I've known, well among them/ He's as genuine as people come. 

HE NEEDS HELP! 

Any royalties received by Music Maykers, formerly G Putnam Music goes to a medical fund by Music Maykers, LLC. NO Admin charges. 

All $$ go to his fund set to support little things like food, utilities, medical support, transportation, clothing, school supplies, & so on.for 3 wonderful young kids, the youngest being 3. Wife lost job due to recent events. Great worker now drives an hour each way to work on clear roads at non-rush hour times. 

Too proud to ask. He & they all are humble. 

Will remain transparent throughout, & signed off by Michael, who has NO idea I'm doing this.  We live under an hour apart. Frankly, needs a sponsor. He may have flair for the genius at times in his creative space. Imagine if he could just do music. Would be unbelievable! . 

Let's please chat.

Title: CRUISIN' ALONG - INSTRO
Comment:
HERE FOR YOUR EAR!

Let's please chat. 

This sensational musical piece typifies amazing creativity, which is flush in his music. His creativity can't be imagined.

NEITHER CAN HIS EXTREME PAIN & LIMITED MOBILITY. Might be the kindest person I've known, well among them/ He's as genuine as people come. 

HE NEEDS HELP! 

Any royalties received by Music Maykers, formerly G Putnam Music goes to a medical fund by Music Maykers, LLC. NO Admin charges. 

All $$ go to his fund set to support little things like food, utilities, medical support, transportation, clothing, school supplies, & so on.for 3 wonderful young kids, the youngest being 3. Wife lost job due to recent events. Great worker now drives an hour each way to work on clear roads at non-rush hour times. 

Too proud to ask. He & they all are humble. 

Will remain transparent throughout, & signed off by Michael, who has NO idea I'm doing this.  We live under an hour apart. Frankly, needs a sponsor. He may have flair for the genius at times in his creative space. Imagine if he could just do music. Would be unbelievable! .

Greg
Composer: Written by Christina Rossetti in 1872 Composed by Gustav Holst in 1906
Grouping: ONE STOP - G Putnam Music owns Masters & Publishing Control
Lyrics:
In the bleak mid-winter
Frosty wind made moan,
Earth stood hard as iron,
Water like a stone;
Snow had fallen, snow on snow,
Snow on snow,
In the bleak mid-winter
Long ago.
Our God, Heaven cannot hold Him
Nor earth sustain;
Heaven and earth shall flee away
When He comes to reign:
In the bleak mid-winter
A stable-place sufficed
The Lord God Almighty,
Jesus Christ.
Enough for Him, whom cherubim
Worship night and day,
A breastful of milk
And a mangerful of hay;
Enough for Him, whom angels
Fall down before,
The ox and ass and camel
Which adore.
Angels and archangels
May have gathered there,
Cherubim and seraphim
Thronged the air,
But only His mother
In her maiden bliss,
Worshipped the Beloved
With a kiss.
What can I give Him,
Poor as I am?
If I were a shepherd
I would bring a lamb,
If I were a wise man
I would do my part,
Yet what I can I give Him,
Give my heart.

Title: BLINKIN' 'BOUT YOU
Comment:
HERE FOR YOUR EAR!

Thanks for listening! 

This sensational musical piece typifies amazing creativity, which is flush in his music. His creativity can't be imagined.

NEITHER CAN HIS EXTREME PAIN & LIMITED MOBILITY. Might be the kindest person I've known, well among them/ He's as genuine as people come. 

HE NEEDS HELP! 

Any royalties received by Music Maykers, formerly G Putnam Music goes to a medical fund by Music Maykers, LLC. NO Admin charges. 

All $$ go to his fund set to support little things like food, utilities, medical support, transportation, clothing, school supplies, & so on.for 3 wonderful young kids, the youngest being 3. Wife lost job due to recent events. Great worker now drives an hour each way to work on clear roads at non-rush hour times. 

Too proud to ask. He & they all are humble. 

Will remain transparent throughout, & signed off by Michael, who has NO idea I'm doing this.  We live under an hour apart. Frankly, needs a sponsor. He may have flair for the genius at times in his creative space. Imagine if he could just do music. Would be unbelievable! . 

Let's please chat.

Lyrics:
I recall the 1st time I saw her  
Plowin' through that crowded school hall n' 
She was blockin' my path 
As I tried to get past  
Shot me a smile then she moved along 
On the bus that ev'nin'  
I was lookin' for a  seat n' 
Once again, stand-in' there 
Those blonde curls - blue eyes -  
Turn-the-world-upside-down with just a simple stare  
I couldn't find the words but I worked up  
The nerves just to say hello 
I was playin' it cool but the cold hard truth  
Was burnin' deep inside my soul 
If by happenstance we ran 
Into each other every single day 
Stay in my way  
I was at the supermarket 
Speedin' through in my cart n' 
She blocked the aisle I needed to go down 
I tried to get it together - should'a known better 
Well, I’m tellin’ this time around 
I couldn't find the words but I worked up  
The nerves just to say hello 
I was playin' it cool but the cold hard truth  
Was burnin' deep inside my soul 
If by happenstance we ran 
Into each other every single day 
Stay in my way  
Next time I saw her 
She gave me her number n' 
I called just to let her know... 
I'm glad I found the words n' the nerve 
To say more than just hello 
I was playin' it cool but this cold hard truth  
Was burnin’ deep inside my soul  
It’s not by chance we ran 
Into each other every single day 
You moved my heart when you stayed in my way 
Mmm mmm mmm 
Stay in my way

Comment:
HERE FOR YOUR EAR!

This sensational musical piece typifies amazing creativity, which is flush in his music. His creativity can't be imagined.

NEITHER CAN HIS EXTREME PAIN & LIMITED MOBILITY. Might be the kindest person I've known, well among them/ He's as genuine as people come. 

HE NEEDS HELP! 

Any royalties received by Music Maykers, formerly G Putnam Music goes to a medical fund by Music Maykers, LLC. NO Admin charges. 

All $$ go to his fund set to support little things like food, utilities, medical support, transportation, clothing, school supplies, & so on.for 3 wonderful young kids, the youngest being 3. Wife lost job due to recent events. Great worker now drives an hour each way to work on clear roads at non-rush hour times. 

Too proud to ask. He & they all are humble. 

Will remain transparent throughout, & signed off by Michael, who has NO idea I'm doing this.  We live under an hour apart. Frankly, needs a sponsor. He may have flair for the genius at times in his creative space. Imagine if he could just do music. Would be unbelievable! .

Ma just grinned – she tried to hold the laughter in

‘Cause this old world is just a flyin’ n’
Pretty soon it’ll fly on past
So don’t you let it slip on by
'Cause so little of it lasts

Now I’m racin’ – chasin - deadlines from behind

Yeah, well, I’m gettin’ older - but that gold ain't closer

the dreams that make me go, feelings I don't show.

when to let go.

Title: BOUNCE ALONG - INSTRO
Comment:
HERE FOR YOUR EAR!

Let's please chat. 
 
This sensational musical piece typifies amazing creativity, which is flush in his music. His creativity can't be imagined.

NEITHER CAN HIS EXTREME PAIN & LIMITED MOBILITY. Might be the kindest person I've known, well among them/ He's as genuine as people come. 

HE NEEDS HELP! 

Any royalties received by Music Maykers, formerly G Putnam Music goes to a medical fund by Music Maykers, LLC. NO Admin charges. 

All $$ go to his fund set to support little things like food, utilities, medical support, transportation, clothing, school supplies, & so on.for 3 wonderful young kids, the youngest being 3. Wife lost job due to recent events. Great worker now drives an hour each way to work on clear roads at non-rush hour times. 
Too proud to ask. He & they all are humble. 

Will remain transparent throughout, & signed off by Michael, who has NO idea I'm doing this.  We live under an hour apart. Frankly, needs a sponsor. He may have flair for the genius at times in his creative space. Imagine if he could just do music. Would be unbelievable! .

Title: Easy Living - INSTRO
Comment:
HERE FOR YOUR EAR!

Let's please chat. 

This sensational musical piece typifies amazing creativity, which is flush in his music. His creativity can't be imagined.

NEITHER CAN HIS EXTREME PAIN & LIMITED MOBILITY. Might be the kindest person I've known, well among them/ He's as genuine as people come. 

HE NEEDS HELP! 

Any royalties received by Music Maykers, formerly G Putnam Music goes to a medical fund by Music Maykers, LLC. NO Admin charges. 

All $$ go to his fund set to support little things like food, utilities, medical support, transportation, clothing, school supplies, & so on.for 3 wonderful young kids, the youngest being 3. Wife lost job due to recent events. Great worker now drives an hour each way to work on clear roads at non-rush hour times. 

Too proud to ask. He & they all are humble. 

Will remain transparent throughout, & signed off by Michael, who has NO idea I'm doing this.  We live under an hour apart. Frankly, needs a sponsor. He may have flair for the genius at times in his creative space. Imagine if he could just do music. Would be unbelievable! .

Title: THIS TIME IT'S LOVE
Comment:
This song can be sung by either & both genders. It's a story song about a man growing up & into love. 

This minimal male-vocal, acoustic guitar/vocal, singer/songwriter tune addresses the issues regarding the age-old battle between love & commitment. The narrator turns the corner on Avenue Love. 

The strong vocal is Zach Jackson from nearby me in Normal, IL., and Zach composed this song to bring it to life. His interpretation nailed the feeling that Jackson's unique vocal convincingly conveys!

HERE FOR YOUR EAR!

Let's please chat.

Title: I LIVE FREE - INSTRO
Comment:
"I Live Free" is an electrifying club dance anthem that pulsates with infectious beats and euphoric melodies, inviting listeners to break free from the confines of everyday life and embrace the liberating power of music on the dance floor.

Thanks for listening! 

This sensational musical piece typifies amazing creativity, which is flush in his music. His creativity can't be imagined.

NEITHER CAN HIS EXTREME PAIN & LIMITED MOBILITY. Might be the kindest person I've known, well among them/ He's as genuine as people come. 

HE NEEDS HELP! 

Any royalties received by Music Maykers, formerly G Putnam Music goes to a medical fund by Music Maykers, LLC. NO Admin charges. 

All $$ go to his fund set to support little things like food, utilities, medical support, transportation, clothing, school supplies, & so on.for 3 wonderful young kids, the youngest being 3. Wife lost job due to recent events. Great worker now drives an hour each way to work on clear roads at non-rush hour times. 

Too proud to ask. He & they all are humble. 

Will remain transparent throughout, & signed off by Michael, who has NO idea I'm doing this.  We live under an hour apart. Frankly, needs a sponsor. He may have flair for the genius at times in his creative space. Imagine if he could just do music. Would be unbelievable! . 

Let's please chat.

Comment:
Song vocals work for either gender/harmonies/

This version's vocalist is the illustrious Lloyd G Miller - Austin, TX [Spirit Song Studios]. Lloyd's the composer, guitarist, vocalist, & engineer. Check him out sometime: https://spiritsongstudios.com/

Music Maykers, LLC

contact@musicmaykers.com  
ASCAP 802139278 (Writer)  
ASCAP 848819778 (Publisher) 
Featured songwriter recognized by TRO-ESSEX 
Several placements in past year.  
 
Thanks for listening! 
Greg
Composer: G Putnam (50%) ASCAP Lloyd Miller (50%)  ASCAP
Grouping: ONE STOP - G Putnam Music Masters & Publishing Control
Lyrics:
Kids came to the game - no one knew my name
Mom had to work so' a neighbor came -- over n'
Dropped me off n' so I went on n' played
Lined up at 2nd base n' saw folks outside the gates - no sir
No one shouted out to me (then)
Watched ev'ryone leave n' stood waitin' for mom--
Got home n' went into the front room
Looked around at what had become too (too)
Crowded with seats n' charmin' decor
Pillows, porcelain, n' pictures from the war (but)
The room still feels empty n' I feel so alone
'Cause after a while I realize daddy's not comin' home
He used to sit right there n' I cried
Sit-in' there by that empty chair
Twenty years later I say I'm all grown up
Ma re-married n'  I finally had to own up
My babe hated that magic monstrosity (said)
They wouldn't even take it free as charity (I)
Had to decide what to do before she came home
Had to give up the ghost n' its host ... well, mostly
Got home n' went into the main room
Looked around at what had become too (too)
Crowded with seats n' charmin' decor
Pillows, porcelain, n' pictures from the war (but)
The room still feels empty n' I can feel so alone
'Cause after a while I realized - daddy's never comin' home
He used to sit right there n' I cried
Sit-in' there by that empty chair
I carried it out the door all by myself
A fittin' end to my childhood hell 
Back then...
Back when...
The room still feels so empty n' I can feel so alone
'Cause it took so long to get past -  daddy's never  comin' home
Now it's no longer here n' I don't cry
Losin' that empty chair
No one ever sat there
The memories deep inside  
They're mine to keep
Not that empty chair

Title: LOOK AT ME
Comment:
This song carries a strong, clean, clear acoustic guitar with a wickedly alluring, convinving vocal. It's a song true ot the heart as the singer reflects on life & on his life, as he listens to the tale of an old man he encountered at a bar. 

HERE FOR YOUR EAR!

Let's please chat. 
 
ONE STOP 
Music Maykers, LLC 
Contact Greg Putnam @ 309-530-4626 
contact@musicmaykers.com  
ASCAP 802139278 (Writer)  
ASCAP 848819778 (Publisher) 
Featured songwriter recognized by TRO-ESSEX 
Several placements in past year.  
 
Thanks for listening! 
Greg
Composer: G Putnam (50%) ASCAP Erik Nelson (50%) ASCAP
Grouping: ONE STOP - G Putnam Music Owns Masters & Publishing Control
Lyrics:
Sitting at the bar drinking thinking where time went
I was ready to get up when in steps an old gent
Sat down by me, turned his tired face my way
In a shaky voice softly asked me to stay
He told me about a friend from his childhood
who worked hard, got ahead, set out to do good
Made money then greed, chasing destiny
In his race to the top, there were things he forgot
See if you think money is what it means to succeed
If you'd take a closer look at what life should be
It's kindness, love, being happy, and look at me, now look at me.
If you tell the truth, it truly paves your path
If you tell a lie, have to keep on looking back
If you want to meet that man with selfish dreams, 
Sonny look at me, yeah look at me.
The old man grew a new sadness and regret
A wife took the kids, didn't really care that they left
When he fell ill, so few came to the hospital
Saw how so much money really brought him so little

Title: FLOATING ON AIR - INSTRO - Cocktail Lounge Piano
Comment:
HERE FOR YOUR EAR!

This sensational musical piece typifies amazing creativity, which is flush in his music. His creativity can't be imagined.

NEITHER CAN HIS EXTREME PAIN & LIMITED MOBILITY. Might be the kindest person I've known, well among them/ He's as genuine as people come. 

HE NEEDS HELP! 

Any royalties received by Music Maykers, formerly G Putnam Music goes to a medical fund by Music Maykers, LLC. NO Admin charges. 

All $$ go to his fund set to support little things like food, utilities, medical support, transportation, clothing, school supplies, & so on.for 3 wonderful young kids, the youngest being 3. Wife lost job due to recent events. Great worker now drives an hour each way to work on clear roads at non-rush hour times. 

Too proud to ask. He & they all are humble. 

Will remain transparent throughout, & signed off by Michael, who has NO idea I'm doing this.  We live under an hour apart. Frankly, needs a sponsor. He may have flair for the genius at times in his creative space. Imagine if he could just do music. Would be unbelievable! .

Title: I LIVE FREE
Comment:
Vocalist, Brianna Shelko
2023 HIMA Award Winner

"I Live Free" is an electrifying club dance anthem that pulsates with infectious beats and euphoric melodies, inviting listeners to break free from the confines of everyday life and embrace the liberating power of music on the dance floor.

Thanks for listening! 

This sensational musical piece typifies amazing creativity, which is flush in his music. His creativity can't be imagined.

NEITHER CAN HIS EXTREME PAIN & LIMITED MOBILITY. Might be the kindest person I've known, well among them/ He's as genuine as people come. 

HE NEEDS HELP! 

Any royalties received by Music Maykers, formerly G Putnam Music goes to a medical fund by Music Maykers, LLC. NO Admin charges. 

All $$ go to his fund set to support little things like food, utilities, medical support, transportation, clothing, school supplies, & so on.for 3 wonderful young kids, the youngest being 3. Wife lost job due to recent events. Great worker now drives an hour each way to work on clear roads at non-rush hour times. 

Too proud to ask. He & they all are humble. 

Will remain transparent throughout, & signed off by Michael, who has NO idea I'm doing this.  We live under an hour apart. Frankly, needs a sponsor. He may have flair for the genius at times in his creative space. Imagine if he could just do music. Would be unbelievable! .

Composer: G Putnam (34%) ASCAP Erik Nelson (33%) ASCAP Al Alsman (33%) ASCAP
Grouping: ONE STOP - G Putnam Music owns Masters & Publishing Control
Lyrics:
She's a cute little baby looking up at me.
Warm sweet eyes,
big open smile.
So much going in,
no words coming out.
Oh, for the thoughts of a child just starting
to learn about learning life.
Well, she grew up strong
and her hair grew long.
High school dance,
teenage romance.
So much going on,
those words flying out.
Does she know or just pretend her past's full of bumps
and bends?
Because she's learning life day and night.
Just learning life,
wrongs and rights.
Sometimes happy,
sometimes sadder.
When does it count?
When don't it matter?
That's a promise of time.
It's all about learning life.
Learning life.
Learning life.
Learning life.
She's a mother now.
Grew up somehow.
Has a job and a house.
Knows what life's about.
Less about success.
More about what's next.
It's finding when to be quiet,
when to holler loud.
Knowing things tend to work out.
That's learning life.
Day and night.
Just learning life,
wrongs and rights.
Sometimes happy,
sometimes sadder.
When does it count?
When don't it matter?
That's a promise of time.
It's all about learning.
It ain't the words you say.
It's what your actions explain.
It's making time to work and taking time to play.
It's about the choices in life.
Cause there ain't no going back.
It's about the times you have.
Learning life, day and night.
Just learning life,
wrongs and rights.
Sometimes happy,
sometimes sadder.
When does it count?
When don't it matter?
That's a promise of time.
It's all about learning life.
Living life.
She's learning life.
Living life.
I'm learning life.
You're learning life.
We're all living life.
That's how we get by.
